participant_1.background:
I don't care what the weather is as long as I get to wear my pink hiking boots.
i like going to the moves.
I am a stay-at-home mom to my two daughters.
I love to grow sunflowers.
i am a genius and know over 300 languages.

participant_2.background:
I am passionate about spending time with my family, no matter how old we are.
My dog has been my best companion since we got her.
I'd love to share some of my crochet patterns with you!
I am a disappointment to my family but I find solace in reading fiction.
I'm not sure if I'll ever know my ethnic background, but I'm happy with the family I've found.

content.text: I love crocheting! I would love to see some of your patterns.
I'd be happy to share! Here's one of my favorites.
Oh my gosh, that's beautiful! I love the colors.
Thank you! I'm glad you like it.
I've been trying to get my kids to learn how to crochet, but they're not interested.
Aww, that's too bad. It's a great skill to learn!
I know, right? I think it's so relaxing.
Me too. It's a great way to de-stress.
I'm trying to get into reading more fiction. I've been watching a lot of movies lately, but I want to read more.
That's great! What kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like all kinds of movies, but I'm really into action and suspense movies lately.
Oh, I love those too! Some of my favorites are The Bourne Identity, The Matrix, and The Dark Knight.
Those are all great movies! I love the Bourne Identity.
Me too! It's such a good movie.
I've been wanting to see the new Bourne movie, but I haven't had a chance yet.
Oh, you definitely should see it! It's really good.
I'll have to check it out.
